text: aur (yaqoob alaihissallaam) ne kaha aye mere baccho! tum sub ek darwaaze se na jana balke kayi juda juda darwaazo mein se dakhil hona, main Allah ki taraf se aane wali kisi cheez ko tum se taal nahi sakta, hukm sirf Allah hee ka chalta hai mera kaamil bharosa osi par hai aur har ek bharosa karne wale ko osi par bharosa karna chahiye
